title: Western Movie | The Tall Texan (1953) Guns Made Him Free...Gold Kept Him Free!

sources.title: Western Movie | The Tall Texan (1953) Guns Made Him Free...Gold Kept Him Free!
sources.description:
The Tall Texan is a 1953 American western film directed by Elmo Williams and written by Elizabeth Reinhardt and Samuel Roeca.

Synopsis:
Sheriff Chanbourne transports convict Ben Trask and a small group in a wagon toward El Paso, but after a wounded Native American offers to lead them to gold, they face deadly attacks and a series of harrowing dangers.

Main Cast:
Lloyd Bridges as Ben Trask
Lee J. Cobb as Capt. Theodore Bess
Marie Windsor as Laura Thompson
Luther Adler as Joshua 'Josh' Tinnen
Syd Saylor as Carney
Samuel Herrick as Sheriff Chadborune
George Steele as Jaqui
Dean Train as Jerome 'Jerry' Niblett

B&W version: https://youtu.be/b2Fkfphnob0


00:00 Full movie
02:09 The group loads supplies onto the wagon for their journey.
05:06 A rider approaches quickly, risking a fall into the canyon.
08:25 The group spots Comanches in the distance, raising alarm.
12:22 Sheriff and Trask argue about the fate of an injured man.
15:01 The group discovers gold, sparking excitement and greed.
22:56 Tensions rise as the group debates crossing into Indian territory.
32:06 Ben and Laura share a moment, discussing their future plans.
40:59 The group struggles with the decision to share gold equally.
52:01 A betrayal is revealed, leading to a deadly confrontation.
60:58 Tensions escalate as the group prepares to leave with their gold.
78:28 Ben urges Laura to escape and find him later in El Paso.
